definition: to sign one's name/visa/variant of 籤|签[qian1]
inscribed bamboo stick (used in divination, gambling, drawing lots etc)/small wood sliver/label/tag
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]

sentences.english: He needs to go to Guadalajara for his visa.
sentences.chinese: 他得去瓜达哈拉纳等待签证。

sentences.english: Would this change affect existing student visa holders?
sentences.chinese: 铹这项变革对现行的学生签证持有者有影响吗？

sentences.english: The visa reciprocity, to me, is a real issue.
sentences.chinese: 在我看来，签证互惠是一个真正的问题。

sentences.english: The government wants the European Union to permit visa-free travel for Turkish citizens.
sentences.chinese: 土耳其政府希望欧盟应当为土耳其公民免除签证。

sentences.english: American officials initially refused her a work visa.
sentences.chinese: 美国官员起初拒绝发给她工作签证。

sentences.english: There would be no cap on the home-buyer visa program.
sentences.chinese: 此类签证的数量没有上限。

sentences.english: I am currently on a subclass 485 visa and have not yet applied for a permanent GSM visa.
sentences.chinese: 我目前是485签证，尚未申请永居技术移民签证。

sentences.english: I am currently on a subclass 485 visa and have not yet applied for a permanent GSM visa.
sentences.chinese: 我目前是485签证，尚未申请永居技术移民签证。

sentences.english: Visa Fee of RMB 250 per applicant.
Good message to China. No more Arunachal visa drama now.
sentences.chinese: 给中国传达了很好的信息，别再搞阿邦签证闹剧了。

sentences.english: I am from Tianjin. Do I have to apply in Beijing?
sentences.chinese: 我是天津人，签证一定要到北京大使馆吗？

sentences.english: We're not encouraging pregnant women to go and get a U. S. visa.
sentences.chinese: 我们不鼓励怀孕妇女去美国并获得美国签证。

sentences.english: UK visa only valid 30 days, Schengen visa for 90 days.
sentences.chinese: 英国签证有效期仅为30天，申根国家为90天。

sentences.english: The visa application charge will be returned to the applicant, care of the migration agent's address.
sentences.chinese: 签证申请费将会经由移民代理的地址转交退给申请人。

sentences.english: Why do you apply for American transit visa?
sentences.chinese: 你办美国过境签证的理由是什么？

definition: permanent residency permit (originally referred specifically to the US green card)
Schengen, village in Luxemburg, location of the 1985 signing of the agreement to create the Schengen area 申根區|申根区[Shen1 gen1 qu1]
permanent resident/person with the right to live in a country or territory
to become naturalized/to become a citizen
